alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Morongo Basin; Owens Valley; White Mountains of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 29 at 1:02PM PDT until May 01 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 11 PM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...South-southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Arizona, southeast California and south central and southern Nevada. * WHEN...From 9 AM to 11 PM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects and reduce visibility due to blowing dust. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Hazardous crosswinds and reduced visibility due to blowing dust possible along Interstate 15 north of Las Vegas, Interstate 40 from Kingman into Yavapai County, Highway 93 east of Hiko, and State Route 375 west of Hiko.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Morongo Basin; Owens Valley; White Mountains of Inyo County
